Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Alexandra Apartments in Bundaberg, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Sugarland Shoppingtown and Bundaberg Tourist Information Centre. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Buss Park and Bundaberg Regional Art Gallery.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 15 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with microwaves and dishwashers. Rooms have private patios. Flat-screen televisions and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include minibars and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Alexandra Apartments in Bundaberg, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Sugarland Shoppingtown and Bundaberg Tourist Information Centre. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Buss Park and Bundaberg Regional Art Gallery.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sugarland Shoppingtown - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Bundaberg Tourist Information Centre - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Buss Park - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Bundaberg Regional Art Gallery - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Bundaberg and District Historical Museum - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Kelly's Beach - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi
Innes Park - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi
Neilson Park - 16.1 km / 10 mi
Bargara Beach - 16.1 km / 10 mi
Life Savers Park - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi
Burrum Coast National Park - 20.3 km / 12.6 mi

The preferred airport for Alexandra Apartments is Bundaberg, QLD (BDB) - 1.6 km / 1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
